txt.en: 'The Paths of the Dead have long been a forbidden place, but that didn't always stop people from venturing within. Whether by choice, force, or mistake, many have gone into those tunnels and never been heard from again.\n\n'Their bodies, or what is left of their bones, are likely still within Kêr Izel and the caves under that wretched mountain. Bring back whatever you can find, I'd like to ensure they get a proper burial. Kêr Izel is in the Paths of the Dead, far to the north of here.'
Golusel is in Dol Amroth.\n\nGolusel will be eager to properly bury the remains you have recovered.
Kêr Izel - Fallen, But Not Forgotten
'These people deserve a proper burial. I will see to it that they get one. Thank you.'
Fallen adventurers can be found at Kêr Izel, within Paths of the Dead, far to the north of Dol Amroth.\n\nGolusel asked you to return any remains of those you found within the Paths of the Dead.
Over the years many have entered the Paths of the Dead. None returned.
